Is this a dream?

2004-01-29

a dream--magical and sad at the same time...


...click them for more

This is The Lucky Strike Factory factor of Taneichi.

Back-story: I got lost on the way to something and gave up; this was my reward. I don't watch much anime (I have only seen Princess Mononoke and Spirited Away), but I really felt like I had been thrust into a world not unlike that. I was sure the snow-capped minibuses and cars piled all over eachother all inbetween the trees would stretch out and yawn, then offer to take me somewhere... else.

Proposition: as much room and board as you can handle to come to Japan and help me shoot a movie here one snowy night. Square-format, like these thumbnails. Lit exclusively by car headlights. Deal?

...

Edit: Whois DLC in Japan?
